CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 绿色的；青葱的；新鲜的；未成熟的；经验不足的；天真的；环保的；用新鲜绿色蔬菜制成的；（信号灯）显示绿灯的；面色苍白的
绿色；绿色颜料；草坪；（尤指城镇或村庄中心的）公共绿地；高尔夫球场的果岭；绿色植物；绿色蔬菜；（Green）格林（姓）；绿党；环保主义者
使变绿；绿化；使环保；提高…的环境保护意识；环境友好化；促进可持续发展

word_group.brief_definition: 绿色技术；绿色工艺；绿色环保技术
绿化地带；绿腰带；绿腰带级运动员
十分妒忌的, 嫉妒的, 眼红的
绿色保险证；汽车国外事故保险证；绿卡
天赋的种植技能，种植花木蔬菜的天赋
园艺技能, 种植技能

list.abstract: Green是一个英文单词，美音是[grin]，英音是[gri:n]，可指绿色的，；绿的；青葱的；也指姓氏格林， 可做名词、形容词、动词。
Green1793年6月或7月生于英国诺丁汉郡；1841年5月31日卒于诺丁汉郡．数学．

yingyinNormal.en: I can't believe you tried to move the green ottoman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法相信你竟敢搬动了绿色垫椅。

yingyinNormal.en: Dumbo Ma. That's not a leaf. Leaves are green.
yingyinNormal.zh: 傻瓜妈妈，这才不是树叶，叶子是绿色的。

yingyinNormal.en: The bag. Which bag? Hermes Birkin, green ostrich.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把包拿来。哪个包？铂金女士包，绿色鸵鸟皮的。

yingyinNormal.en: Blue and yellow make green. Well, then it's settled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蓝加黄不就是绿色吗。就这么愉快地决定了 。

yingyinNormal.en: Now for the cherry tree. We need green for the leaves. But there isn't any green.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在再来画樱桃树，要用绿色来画树叶。可是我们没有绿色颜料呀。

yingyinNormal.en: We can make brown. We'll mix the green and the red. Mixing green and red makes brown.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以调出棕色，我们可以混合绿色和红色。混合绿色和红色就是棕色。

yingyinNormal.en: Because right from the start they were reflecting green light, the stalks of the plants became green and the leaves were green.
yingyinNormal.zh: 由于从一开始这些植物的先祖们就只反射绿色光线，因而植物的茎叶也随之而呈现出绿色。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, what's in this tank? Nothing. It's just green slime. That green slime is algae.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，这个水箱里是什么？没什么！只是一个绿色的史莱姆。那个绿色的史莱姆是水藻。

yingyinNormal.en: Never mind. If we mix blue paint with yellow paint, we can make green. Mixing blue and yellow makes green. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系，把蓝色和黄色和在一起，就能调出绿色了。把蓝色和黄色加在一起就是绿色。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon? Fine. Now that we're not playing, you can be green. Thank you. And since you're green this time, I can be it next time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿呢？好吧，现在我们不玩了，绿色给你当吧。谢主隆恩。这次你是绿色，那下次就换我了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's see which color car comes along first. Okay. Here is Candy Cat in her green car. Green. That's my favorite color. I win.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们来看看什么颜色的车先过来。好的！小猫坎迪坐着绿色的车来了。哈哈，绿色！那是我最喜欢的颜色，我赢了！

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I see you moved the green ottoman. How did that happen?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你移动了绿色的垫椅，怎么会呢？

yingyinNormal.en: No. You just need to paint your face green, and that's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用，你只要把脸涂成绿色就可以了。

yingyinNormal.en: And the makeup was green. I was pretending to be The Hulk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并且那化妆品是绿色的，我只是想扮绿巨人而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Like wood for a fire. Green magic takes life to open the gate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像木材用来生火一样，绿色魔法需要生命才能开门。

yingyinNormal.en: They had to live off the colors of light left over. This made them appear green. These were the green bacteria.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们只能依靠水体深处残存的光线生存，而这使得它们呈绿色，这就是绿细菌。

yingyinNormal.en: So from here, we'll jump to a green-screen shot of you laughing, too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从这里，我们用绿色背景拍摄一幕你也在大笑的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, I found something green on here. Two pistachio ice creams, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在上面找到绿色食品了，麻烦来两份开心果冰激凌。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, the footprints have stopped. Look. There are some green steps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，脚印到这里就没有了。看哪 ！这里有一个绿色的楼梯。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, everybody! I'm going green, and I don't just mean my eye shadow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家安安！我要开始绿化，而且我不是指我的眼影画绿色。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 绿色的；被绿色植物覆盖的；幼嫩的；未熟的；脸色发青的；有病容的；关注环境的；幼稚的；用新鲜绿色蔬菜制成的；（信号灯

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 绿化地带；绿腰带；绿腰带级运动员

examination_example.sentence: Successive governments have presided over selling <highlight>green</highlight> spaces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历届政府都在主政期间出售绿地。

examination_example.sentence: Hill's pressure later led to the creation of national parks and <highlight>green</highlight> belts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在希尔的压力下，后来建立了国家公园和绿化带。

examination_example.sentence: Only Ukip, sensing its chance, has sided with those pleading for a more considered approach to using <highlight>green</highlight> land.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有英国知识产权组织意识到了自己的机会，站在那些呼吁采取更深思熟虑的方法来使用绿地的人一边。

examination_example.sentence: When we are deprived of <highlight>green</highlight>, of plants, of trees, most of us give in to a demoralization of spirit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们不再拥有绿色，植物和树的时候，我们大多数人会深陷于精神萎靡的状态。

examination_example.sentence: Several fast-fashion companies have made efforts to curb their impact on labor and the environment — including H&M, with its <highlight>green</highlight> Conscious Collection line.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好几家快速时尚公司都在努力抑制它们对劳动力和环境的影响，包括推出注重环保的系列产品的H&M。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 绿叶；青葱的草木；植被

examination_example.sentence: What is needed is a second <highlight>green</highlight> revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要的是第二次绿色革命。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 绿叶；青葱的草木；植被

word_family.mean: adj. 绿色的；被绿色植物覆盖的；幼嫩的；未熟的；脸色发青的；有病容的；关注环境的；幼稚的；用新鲜绿色蔬菜制成的；（信号灯

examination_example.sentence: Whatever the case, your passport will likely be one of four colors: red, blue, <highlight>green</highlight> or black, although there are slight variations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管是哪种情况，你的护照很可能是四种颜色之一：红色、蓝色、绿色或黑色，尽管有细微的变化。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Green</highlight> Hornet lunch box, because he used to listen to the radio show back in the 1940s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 青蜂侠饭盒，因为他在20世纪40年代经常听广播节目。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>greening</highlight> of the West does not delight everyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西部的绿化并不是每个人都喜欢。

sense_info_list.en: supporting the protection of the environment as a political principle

examination_example.sentence: But this is a <highlight>green</highlight> tax, which Bali Governor Wayan Koster has been working on for months.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这是一种绿色税，巴厘岛州长瓦扬·科斯特已经努力了几个月。

examination_example.sentence: Pay a <highlight>green</highlight> tax upon arrival.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到达时缴纳绿色税。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Green</highlight> buildings like this aren't necessarily cost-efficient for the investor, but it does produce much less pollution than that caused by energy production through fossil fuels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对投资者来说，这样的环保建筑不一定具有成本效益，但它产生的污染远少于通过化石燃料产出能源所造成的污染。

examination_example.sentence: My mission is to encourage <highlight>green</highlight> hands and those lacking time or money to feed themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的任务是鼓励新手和那些缺乏时间或金钱的人养活自己。

examination_example.sentence: I count twelve shades of <highlight>green</highlight> from where I stand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 放眼望去，我数出了十二种深浅不一的绿色色调。

examination_example.sentence: Your cat can't see bright colors such as red and <highlight>green</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的猫看不到明亮的颜色，如红色和绿色。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 绿色技术；绿色工艺；绿色环保技术

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 绿色的；被绿色植物覆盖的；幼嫩的；未熟的；脸色发青的；有病容的；关注环境的；幼稚的；用新鲜绿色蔬菜制成的；（信号灯

examination_example.sentence: In general, there are two kinds of tea: black tea and <highlight>green</highlight> tea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，有两种茶:红茶和绿茶。

examination_example.sentence: Let's work together for a <highlight>green</highlight> planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们一起为绿色星球而努力。

examination_example.sentence: Why did the man choose the <highlight>green</highlight> sweater?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个男人为什么选择绿色毛衣？

examination_example.sentence: What an exciting story Mr. <highlight>Green</highlight> told us just now!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格林先生刚才给我们讲了一个多么激动人心的故事啊！

examination_example.sentence: Mr. <highlight>Green</highlight> works in a hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 格林先生在一家医院工作。

examination_example.sentence: In Dr. <highlight>Green</highlight>’s opinion, talking is a way for mothers to relax after a day’s work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在格林博士看来，谈话是妈妈们工作一天后放松的一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: Different chemicals produced different colors of flames, including bright orange and dark <highlight>green</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同的化学物质产生不同颜色的火焰，包括亮橙色和深绿色。

examination_example.sentence: They began as an army of red, blue, yellow, <highlight>green</highlight>, white, and purple.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们开始是一支由红、蓝、黄、绿、白和紫组成的军队。

examination_example.sentence: Color: pink, red, <highlight>green</highlight>, yellow and purple
examination_example.sentence_trans: 颜色:粉色、红色、绿色、黄色和紫色。
